name: Best Chicken Salad Ever II
author: Kat
summary: My favorite chicken salad of all times.  This is one you must try if you are a fan of chicken salads.  Use white wine Worcestershire, if you can find it.  Try serving this salad on a bed of lettuce or as a sandwich filling.
ingredients: 6 (4 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
directions: In a large, self-sealing bag, combine honey and Worcestershire sauce
Add chicken and place bag in a shallow dish in the refrigerator
Chill 2 to 4 hours, turning bag occasionally
Grill chicken over medium heat for 12 to 15 minutes, until juices run clear and chicken is no longer pink inside
Remove from grill, cool and chop
In a medium bowl, whisk together the remaining honey, mustard, vinegar, lemon zest, lemon pepper, poppy seeds and garlic powder
Add chicken, grapes and cashews and toss until evenly coated
